column5: Great video TJ !!  I've got scat in the back yard, foot prints in the driveway, garbage bins getting busted open up and down the road and sightings all around me, but I've yet to meet Mr. Bruin in person myself .  Always got the camera nearby though.
A bear outside is better than a bear inside like that bear out in BC which got into a pizza place & ate 4 pies before leaving......
Keep feeding her... she'll make a great rug for in front of the camp stove....
pet it TJ
Maybe Geoff will trade you his goose for it
It wants its belly scratched!
Ah Glen,it would be like he was rubbing his belly.LOL
Well i am glad its a picture of the bear then.
TJ, take off your shirt. I wanna see what a jealous bear looks like.
Crock pot and your Favorite spices , tastes real good . Chote um Chote um, Bear makes good eatings .
home delivery and it's fattening itself up for the hunt...nice
...and it's "Veal" Bruce !
Closest thing I get to bears in my front yard is raccoons...

TJ wakes up one morning to find a bear on his roof. So he looks in the yellow pages and sure enough, there's an ad for 'Bear Removers.' He calls the number, and the bear remover says he'll be over in 30 minutes.  The bear remover arrives, and gets out of his van. He's got a ladder, a baseball bat, a shotgun and a mean old pit bull.  'What are you going to do,' TJ asks?  'I'm going to put this ladder up against the roof, and then I'm going to go up there and knock the bear off the roof with this baseball bat. When the bear falls off, the pit bull is trained to grab his testicles and not let go. The bear will then be subdued enough for me to put him in the cage in the back of the van.'  He hands the shotgun to tj WHATS the shot gun for ??  *'If the bear knocks me off the roof, shoot the dog
lol
LMAO Bruce.

go outside, put him in a headlock and start giving him noogies. Its a good way to find out if mom is still around
If Im not mistaken,I do believe I heard "IT,S HUGE" I cant stop laughing,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
Sell your house for whatever you can get for it and run as fast as you can TJ. I mean OMG!!!! There's a bear in your yard???
thank god you don't live in London they probably would have sent out the swat team .
Nice one TJ!!! Cute little guy
HA HA HA  Hunters dont call them "CUTE"  :rofl2:
I would too!  Too bad my bird is gone.  maybe it's there because it's seen TJ without a shirt on and thinks he's pappa?
